====ANIMATION WHEN EXECUTING

description: Very basic grenade, attacks all enemies.
name: Cluster Pulse Grenade
note:
<throw object: before>
 image: icon 242
 duration: 50
 arc: 100
 spin: 3
</throw object>
<action sequence: movement>
if: action.isStepForward()
motion: user, walk
move: user, forward, 15, 48
else 
move: user, forward, 15, 48
end
wait: user, move
motion: user, reset
</action sequence>

======ANIMATION WHEN EXECUTING======
<action sequence: execute>
action: all targets, effect
wait: user, 120
</action sequence> 

===ANIMATION WHEN RETURNING====
<action sequence: return>
move: user, to home, 8
wait: user, move
motion: user, reset 
</action sequence>
